nodes.text: On the planet Haruun Kal, the Korunnal Highland was a continent-sized plateau that was the only habitable area of the planet, as it was the only area that sat high enough above the toxic cloudsea that encapsulated most of the lowlands to support life. Except for Pelek Baw, the capital of Haruun Kal, the entire plateau was covered by dense, deadly jungle.
